q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models

Class PTNSimulationInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models.PTNSimulationInterpreter

  • public class PTNSimulationInterpreter
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles simulation events, i.e. when a transition was switched. Only the PTNSimulationInterpreter knows the rules or what has exactly to happen when the app is in sim mode.
    Author:
    q8388415 - Massimiliano Brero

    • Method Detail

      • handleClick

        public void handleClick(TransitionView transitionView)
                 throws PTNSimulationException
        Starts simulation process after a transition was clicked in simulation mode. If this method encounters an PTNSimulationException it will reset the node tokens their their initial state and the exception; this way the net is kept in an consistent state. After a simulation state the affected transitions are updated.
        Parameters:
        transitionView -
        Throws:
        PTNSimulationException
